com.facebook.buck.cxx

Class CxxPreprocessAndCompile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.rules.AbstractBuildRule
      • com.facebook.buck.cxx.CxxPreprocessAndCompile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasBuildTarget, BuildRule, RuleKeyAppendable, java.lang.Comparable<HasBuildTarget>

    public class CxxPreprocessAndCompile
extends AbstractBuildRule
implements RuleKeyAppendable
    A build rule which preprocesses and/or compiles a C/C++ source in a single step.
